comments.text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US) AppleWebKit/534.16 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/10.0.648.151 Safari/534.16
Build Identifier: 

Chinese version of the firefox is download from http://firefox.com.cn.
It will guide the user during installation to install some components.
Which has a component called "字体设置", it will change the browser's default font into "Microsoft YaHei".
The font changes will lead to bad is I made some websites, such as:http://www.misuisui.com/weblog/wp-content/uploads/2011/03/qzoneshop.png .
Why download the firefox from China and the United States not the same download of firefox?
You must stop the Chinese site that installed the component behavior.
This behavior is very bad, unpleasant.
Thank you

Reproducible: Always
comments.creator: s5s5cn@gmail.com
comments.raw_text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows; U; Windows NT 5.1; en-US) AppleWebKit/534.16 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/10.0.648.151 Safari/534.16
Build Identifier: 

Chinese version of the firefox is download from http://firefox.com.cn.
It will guide the user during installation to install some components.
Which has a component called "字体设置", it will change the browser's default font into "Microsoft YaHei".
The font changes will lead to bad is I made some websites, such as:http://www.misuisui.com/weblog/wp-content/uploads/2011/03/qzoneshop.png .
Why download the firefox from China and the United States not the same download of firefox?
You must stop the Chinese site that installed the component behavior.
This behavior is very bad, unpleasant.
Thank you

Reproducible: Always
